actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for activities of the National Science Foundation.

summary.text: National Science Foundation Authorization Act - Authorizes appropriations for activities of the National Science Foundation for fiscal year 1978, including the following categories: (1) $249,200,000 for mathematical and physical sciences and engineering; (2) $213,400,000 for astronomical, atmospheric, Earth, and ocean sciences; (3) $47,475,000 for United States Antarctic research program; (4) $144,800,000 for biological, behavioral and social sciences; (5) $75,700,000 for science education programs; (6) $78,000,000 for Research Applied to National Needs; (7) $22,600,000 for Scientific, Technological, and International Affairs; and (8) $47,825,000 for Program Development and Management. Limits the transfer of funds from one category to another.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for activities of the National Science Foundation.
